prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with a sturdy body and vibrant green accents.
Show me a metallic blue Pokemon with giant tusks and a friendly demeanor.
Design a powerful steel-type creature inspired by elephants with intricate patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles an ancient warrior with a strong build and earthy colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with a massive frame and a gentle personality, perfect for a nature-themed region.
Make a unique Pokemon that blends steel and ground types with a focus on strength and resilience.
Give me a Pokemon that stands tall with a majestic presence, utilizing its heavy build in battles.
